Name: Cat Cat Village Half-day Guided Tour from Sa Pa
Description: On this tour, you will get a chance to visit the Cat Cat Village and learn about the timeless culture and traditions of the ethnic Black Hmong people. Once you reach the village you will find yourself surrounded by rice terraces and maze fields. Here, you can buy brocade products such as bracelets, scarves, apparel, etc as souvenirs. You will also visit an old French Hydro Electric Power Station and gorgeous Cat Cat Waterfalls. You will round off the tour with a sumptuous lunch at a logical Vietnamese restaurant.
What's Included:
Admission to Cat Cat Village
Transportation
Guide services
Lunch
Hotel drop-off (transportation)
Hotel pickup (on foot)
Additional Info:
Please note that a minimum of five participants is required for this tour to go ahead. If this requirement is not met, the tour can be cancelled and you will either be provided with an alternative date or a full refund.
Please wear sun cream, sunglasses, a cap, or a hat during the tour.
The routes related to the tour may change due to weather or traffic conditions.
If there are children in your tour group, please indicate the number of children at checkout. Children aged 0–3 years can join the tour for free if they will not occupy separate seats.
Please bring your ticket with you to the attraction.
Be aware that operators may cancel for unforeseen reasons.
You need to be 18 years or older to book or be accompanied by an adult.
Operated by Klook
What to Know:
The tour guide will pick you up at 08:30 from your centrally-located hotel on foot. The hotel drop-off will happen by vehicle. Please wait in the hotel lobby ten minutes prior to the arranged time.
The sample menu on this tour will include:
- Rau su su luộc (boiled chayote)
- Thịt lợn bản nướng/rang  (Cắp nách pigs)
- Cá suối chiên (fried fish)
- Rau xào thập cẩm (mixed stir-fried vegetables)
- Canh Rau - (vegetable soup)
- Cơm (steamed rice)
- Trái cây tráng miệng (fresh fruits)
The menu is subject to change depending on the season and availability of ingredients.
